Headline: Live the Plum life
ShortDescription: Plum helps companies care better for their employees by offering insurance and health benefits that are simple, inclusive, and accessible.

Highlights.name: Simplified Health Insurance for Businesses:
Highlights.description: Plum emphasizes simplifying health insurance for businesses. Their platform aims to streamline the process of buying, managing, and claiming health insurance for employees

Highlights.name: Comprehensive Employee Health Insurance Solutions
Highlights.description: Plum offers group health insurance plans, group personal accident insurance, and group term life insurance. This caters to a range of employee health and financial protection needs.

Highlights.name: Technology-Driven Approach:
Highlights.description: Plum offers an online platform for businesses to manage their employee health insurance. This allows for easy enrollment, claims processing, and communication.

enhanced_description: Plum HQ is a fully digital platform designed to simplify employee insurance and health benefits management for businesses. It offers comprehensive solutions including group health insurance plans, group personal accident insurance, and group term life insurance, ensuring accessibility and inclusivity for employees. The platform streamlines the process of buying, managing policies, understanding benefits, and initiating claims, making it easier for employees to utilize their insurance. Plum HQ provides 24*7 support and boasts the highest claims NPS, indicating high employee satisfaction with the claims process. It is backed by prominent investors Tiger Global & Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia Capital).
